column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I grabbed a chocolate chip cookie at the counter.  And OH MY GOSH
column2: it was so tasty! It was perfectly sweet and so moist.  I ended up only eating a bite prior to my meal
column3: and even when I got home hours later to devour the rest
column4: it was still just as tasty.  I also had the breakfast sandwich
column5: which had a large piece of patty type sausage
column7: aioli sauce and lettuce.  The flavor was great and I didn't leave feeling overly full.
